properties.name: Acapulco, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Acapulco, MexicoAcapulco...The paradise of Mexicans! My Lola lives here on a beautiful coastal area, I love going downtown and sightseeing ;) *winks. Amazing beaches and bitches!

properties.name: Bangkok, Thailand
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh bangkokBangkok! Thailand\'s best city, guaranteed to get laid...JK. Been here a few times, usually just for sightseeing and in between flights. I love the city, it\'s so full of life...and Thais

properties.name: Chiang Mai, Thailand
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Chiang Mai, ThailandChiang Mai, Thailand. Such a nice city! It\'s sorrounded by green! :D I\'ve been here a few times and I\'ve always loved it. It is my Tita Saranya\'s hometown. I rode my first elephant here. n__n

properties.name: Guadalajara, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh GuadalajaraThe great Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. Been here countless of times usually as a stop en-route to Michoacán. Great food and shopping Very large metropolitan city of Mexico.!

properties.name: Guanajuato, Guanajuato, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Guanajuato, Guanajuato, Mexico; It\'s quite a sight, seemingly there\'s nothing in the state of Guanajuato but this city is full of life! Been here so many times to see the architecture and mummies, great place!

properties.name: Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh  Hermosillo is a nice city, really busy and full of people from all over Mexico, some going to the border...*wonder why, LOL, others traveling to the interior of the republic. I\'ve stopped here to eat allot. I had a crush on someone I met here...never saw you again :(

properties.name: Irapuato, Guanajuato, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh I\'ve only been here once, but I loved my time there. I stopped to eat at a roadside restaurant and ate a great meal! I also had strawberries *allergic reaction sucked. (This is Mexico\'s #1 Strawberry city btw)

properties.name: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Kuala Lumpur Kuala Lumpur! It\'s a giant city, although my only glimpse of Kuala Lumper was from windows in it\'s international airport. I spent my time shopping, afterwards I left for Thailand.

properties.name: Mexicali, Baja California, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Mexicali! Baja trashville LOL, this is but a stop on way to Tijuana/United States. It\'s basically a cheap man\'s shopping zone. It\'s quite the dirty, but it has a charm. I once had a girlfriend here xD

properties.name: Mexico City, Federal District, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Mexico City, MexicoMexico City, Mexico. Mexico\'s biggest and most amazing city! I love Mexico City, for a while there I believed I would live there forever. Great shopping, recreation, culture, sex ;) LOL. Mexico CIty is my most beloved city in the world.

properties.name: Morelia, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Morelia, MexicoMorelia, Michoacán, Mexico; My homeland. I was born in this beautiful city. I\'ve been here more times than I can remember. The city is picturesque & offers great shopping and recreation. Perhaps Mexico\'s most beautiful city.

properties.name: Nogales, Sonora, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Nogales, Sonora...lol, it\'s a pitstop on the way to deep Mexico. I really don\'t know much about this place...cool McDonald\'s I guess, saw some cuties in school uniform lol

properties.name: Phuket, Thailand
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Phuket ThailandPhuket, Thailand. A beautiful city! It has some of the best beaches I have EVER seen. Went here to visit my Tia Felicitas (Mom\'s sister).

properties.name: Romita, Guanajuato, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh I was only here for a few hours to meet my uncle\'s family. It was a small Mexican ranch town, but I liked it for some odd reason. I saw some good sights ;)

properties.name: San Luis Río Colorado, Sonora, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh I have few memories of S.L.R.C., I remember passing through this city on my way to the United States. The river is the Colorado River (which is dirty as hell) Eh, not quite fond of this place.

properties.name: Seoul, South Korea
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh South KoreaSeoul, South Korea, OMG! It\'s so H U G E. I never left the airport but it seemed as if all of Korea was in there! By the looks it\'s an amazing city, I was only there en-route to Malaysia/Thailand but I was never ceased to be amazed

properties.name: Silao, Guanajuato, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh I\'ve only been in Silao once but I was amazed by it, after hours of seeing cows and fields you appreciate a nice city, there\'s a giant statue of Jesus on a hill somewhere near.

properties.name: Tijuana
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh OMG! Tijuana...Mexico\'s party city! LOL, love this little border town!

properties.name: Uruapan
properties.description: Posted by Behtoh Uruapan, Michoacán, Mexico; It\'s a nice city sorrounded by forests, I mainly go here to visit the national park. Amazingly beautiful architecture.
